file.name: A Garden to Dye For - How to Use Plants from the Garden to Create Natural Colors for Fabrics & Fibers.epub

tika.dc.description: In A Garden to Dye For, author and gardener Chris McLaughlin showcases 40+ plants that the gardener-crafter can grow for an all-natural, customized color palette. The richly photographed book is divided between the garden and the dye process, with garden layouts, plant profiles, dye extraction and uses, step-by-step recipes and original, engaging DIY projects.
